languages.text: "Столь нетипичная для мирянки осведомленность заслуживала бы одобрения, если бы не тот факт, что генетор Канассиан был отлучен около трех столетий назад".
"Your display of knowledge, atypical for a layperson, would warrant approbation, were it not for the fact that Genetor Kanassian was excommunicated approximately three centuries ago."
languages.original_text: "Столь нетипичная для мирянки осведомленность заслуживала бы одобрения, если бы не тот факт, что генетор Канассиан был отлучен около трех столетий назад".

traits.locale_text: "Your display of knowledge, atypical for a layperson, would warrant approbation, were it not for the fact that Genetor Kanassian was excommunicated approximately three centuries ago."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your display of knowledge, atypical for a layperson, would warrant approbation, were it not for the fact that Genetor Kanassian was excommunicated approximately three centuries ago."

traits.locale_text: "Your display of knowledge, atypical for a layperson, would warrant approbation, were it not for the fact that Genetor Kanassian was excommunicated approximately three centuries ago."

traits.locale_text: "Your display of knowledge, atypical for a layperson, would warrant approbation, were it not for the fact that Genetor Kanassian was excommunicated approximately three centuries ago."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “你的知识面已经远远超出了普通人的范畴。如果不是因为卡纳森基因士在大约三个世纪之前被逐出教会的话，你对知识的了解本该得到称赞。”
languages.original_text: "Your display of knowledge, atypical for a layperson, would warrant approbation, were it not for the fact that Genetor Kanassian was excommunicated approximately three centuries ago."

traits.locale_text: “你的知识面已经远远超出了普通人的范畴。如果不是因为吉奈特·卡纳森在大约三个世纪之前被逐出教会的话，你对知识的了解本该得到称赞。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Su despliegue de conocimientos, inesperado para una persona lega, sería digno de aprobación de no ser porque el genetor Kanassian fue excomulgado hace aproximadamente tres siglos».
languages.original_text: "Your display of knowledge, atypical for a layperson, would warrant approbation, were it not for the fact that Genetor Kanassian was excommunicated approximately three centuries ago."

traits.locale_text: «Su despliegue de conocimientos, inesperado para una persona lega, sería digno de aprobación de no ser porque el genetor Kanassian fue excomulgado hace aproximadamente tres siglos».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの知識は、門外漢にしては珍しいものです。遺伝学者カナシアンが約3世紀前に破門されたという事実さえなければ、称賛に値するものです」
languages.original_text: "Your display of knowledge, atypical for a layperson, would warrant approbation, were it not for the fact that Genetor Kanassian was excommunicated approximately three centuries ago."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの知識は、門外漢にしては珍しいものです。遺伝学者カナシアンが約3世紀前に破門されたという事実さえなければ、称賛に値するものです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Euer für Laien untypisches Wissen würde eine Bestätigung rechtfertigen, wenn Genetor Kanassian nicht vor etwa drei Jahrhunderten exkommuniziert worden wäre."
languages.original_text: "Your display of knowledge, atypical for a layperson, would warrant approbation, were it not for the fact that Genetor Kanassian was excommunicated approximately three centuries ago."

traits.locale_text: "Euer für Laien untypisches Wissen würde eine Bestätigung rechtfertigen, wenn Genetor Kanassian nicht vor etwa drei Jahrhunderten exkommuniziert worden wäre."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette connaissance inattendue de la part d'une profane mériterait approbation, si le genetor Kanassian n'avait pas été excommunié il y a environ trois siècles. »
languages.original_text: "Your display of knowledge, atypical for a layperson, would warrant approbation, were it not for the fact that Genetor Kanassian was excommunicated approximately three centuries ago."

traits.locale_text: « Cette connaissance inattendue de la part d'une profane mériterait approbation, si le genetor Kanassian n'avait pas été excommunié il y a environ trois siècles. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Meslek dışından biri için oldukça sıra dışı ölçekte bilgi sahibi olman aslında takdir görebilirdi, eğer Genetör Kanassian yaklaşık üç yüzyıl önce aforoz edilmemiş olsaydı."
languages.original_text: "Your display of knowledge, atypical for a layperson, would warrant approbation, were it not for the fact that Genetor Kanassian was excommunicated approximately three centuries ago."
